cause.description:
The USA needs a real President. Not a dumbass who looks like a monkey- a real President. It needs a President who has not only won Mr.Universe 5 times, but who has been a time-traveling Cyborg Assasin. Sound like Hillary Clinton? I think not.
1. Arnie is awesome
cause.mission: Elect Governor Schwarzenager of California as the President of the United States of America in 2008
cause.name: Arnie for President 2008!
